name: In the Matter of Joseph P. CAPONE

parties: In the Matter of Joseph P. CAPONE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 22rid day of January, 1999, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania dated December 2,1998, the Petition for Reinstatement is granted.
Pursuant to Rule 218(e), Pa.R.D.E., petitioner is directed to pay the expenses incurred by the Board in the investigation and processing of the Petition for Reinstatement.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
724 A.2d 926
In the Matter of Joseph P. CAPONE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 22, 1999.
